title: Collaboration Item Shared
description: Fires when an item is shared with others.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of the shared item.

itemType.description: The type of item being shared.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace the item belongs to.

shareType.description: The type of sharing applied to the item.

recipientCount.description: The number of recipients the item was shared with.
